channel.title: Iron-man mode rant
channel.description:
Iron-man wasn't made to be at half or less then the original server experience rate. In-case you didn't know what iron-man is: http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Ironman_Mode Here you go, thank-you.
Is it bugging anyone else?

item.title: Iron-man mode rant
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Pipe Dream:

What bugs me is the no banking iron man mode? How? Why?

No where does it say people in “Ironman mode” cannot bank. You are thinking of Ultimate Ironman mode.

These are the restrictions for Ironman mode:

Ironman players are not able to do the following:

Trade with other players (except certain quest items from Shield of Arrav and Heroes Quest)
Picking up drops from other players kills, including PvP
No experience gain from Player-versus-player encounters (base magic experience from casting spells is still gained)
See monster drops if the monster isn’t dealt 100% damage
Accept Aid button is off and cannot be turned on
Enter another players Player-owned house.
Buy items from other players through shops
Play the Fishing Trawler minigame
Receive items via balloons in the Falador Party Room
Staking in the Duel Arena
Play Nightmare Zone (only solo mode, and cannot purchase resources from the reward chest)

Ultimate ironman mode is everything in ironman mode, including:

Furthermore Ultimate Ironman players are not able to do the following: Receive resources from Managing Miscellania Send their Servant to the bank or the sawmill Use the banks of Runescape Players who choose to activate Ultimate Ironman Mode, in addition to the standard Iron Man restrictions, will be unable to use a bank, but will be able to use noted items on bank booths to unnote them. They are also unable to create item sets using the trading post. In addition, Ultimate Iron Man players will also lose all their items upon death.

Also, OP. Where does it say that they gain less than normal XP?

Read full topic

item.title: Iron-man mode rant
item.dc:creator: @Pipe_Dream Pipe Dream
item.description:
@Pipe_Dream wrote:

[quote=“Motekiku, post:3, topic:550476”][quote author=Pipe Dream link=topic=669383.msg4476185#msg4476185 date=1426021910]
What bugs me is the no banking iron man mode? How? Why?
[/quote]

I have no idea, or the once you die you can’t come back to life. So, re-make another character please. lol[/quote]

I did not even know that.

Read full topic
